About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO


Enthusiastic graphic & web designer
Creative problem solver
Team player and fast leaner

Always give the best of myself to bring you to success.

Before I came to Canada, I was an Apple Expert in my hometown, HangZhou.
Apple's products are always amazing, whether it's hardware or software. This journey encouraged me to step out of my comfort zone.So I chose to keep my curiosity, came to the new country, and started a new journey.
If you are interested in my experience, please contact me. I love sharing :)
